text: The Best Of is a compilation album by the Danish industrial band Psychopomps. The album contains the band's most popular tracks as well as some remixes. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== *Jesper Schmidt: Vox, Programming, Keyboards *Flemming Norre Larsen: Programming, Lyrics ==External links== * Psychopomps at myspace * The Best Of (Psychopomps) CD at Amazon.com Category:Psychopomps (band) albums Category:2000 greatest hits albums
title: The Best Of (Psychopomps album)
